overview: In urban America, the bush of Africa, the war zone of the Congo, and in closed nations there are women who are living outside their own cultures, society, and comfort level to care for orphans, build schools, liberate addicts, feed the poor, and love the broken. These ordinary women are reaching into hopeless situations of people and creating hope.
tagline: Ordinary Women Bringing Extraordinary Hope In Unlikely Places
title: Hope Has A Name
